example.ex: In the first movie Tony Curtis ever made he played a grocery clerk.
example.tran: 托尼·柯蒂斯在其首部电影里，扮演了一个食品杂货店店员。

entry.def: You can talk about the movies when you are talking about seeing a movie in a movie theater.

example.ex: He took her to the movies.

Sentence.sentence: The ruling would be in Bowman's favor if the case were argued in a Hollywood movie.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Hollywood movies usually have an unexpected, dramatic impact on real-life arguments.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Disaster movies often portray catastrophes that destroy, or at least threaten to destroy earth's entire population.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Then when did his movie career really start?
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But the movie that really made him famous was his second one, Rebel Without a Cause, that was about teenagers who felt like they didn't fit into society
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He made numerous popular movies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: So how many more movies did he make
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Well I guess his looks, his acting ability, his short life, and maybe the type of character he played in his movies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In the beginning of the movie I, Robot, a robot has to decide whom to save after two cars plunge into the water— Del Spooner or a child.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So how could you ever become a movie star?
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: You dream about being a movie star.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"电影"之意。
means: cinema与the连用指(上映的)电影，电影工业；可指电影院；在英国与the连用还可指电影艺术。
film ： 指电影、影片，普通用词。
movie ： 美国英语中的口语用词。
picture ： 从原义指银幕或电视屏幕上的图像引申指影片。

means.word_mean: 1. a form of entertainment that enacts a story by a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement;

sentences.sentence: "they went to a movie every Saturday night"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bird鸟+ie小东西或人→n.[儿语]小鸟

stems_affixes.value_cn: [有共同兴趣的]小团体,小圈子
stems_affixes.word_buile: coter小屋子+ie小东西或人→n.[有共同兴趣的]小团体,小圈子
move移动+ie小东西或人→movie电影,电影院
rook乌鸦+ie小东西或人→n.新兵,新球员
room房间+ie小东西或人→n.住在同一房间里的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]
stems_affixes.word_buile: short矮+ie小东西或人→n.矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]

Sentence.sentence: After 75 years the plaza theater has shown its last movie.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: An endless number of books and movies qualify as love stories in popular culture.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: And I could not understand the news on the television or movies or anything like this.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Caroline Hugo, famous writer and influential movie critic.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 信息匹配 题设

Sentence.sentence: Fortunately, I didn't get any channels showing all-night movies or I would never have gotten to bed.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: He failed to find any movie shows on it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: It appeared on some of the first postcards, starred in some of the earliest silent movies, and was the subject of a couple of the earliest photos, dating all the way back to the 1800s.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Kristin Chenoweth and Peter Gallagher star in the musical comedy by Betty Comden and Adolph Green,about a broadway producer who tries to win a movie star's love during a cross-country train journey.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Look to many of history's cultural symbols, and there you'll find an ancestor of frosty, the snowman in the movie frozen.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Minutes after the last movie ended yesterday at the plaza theater, employees were busy sweeping up popcorns and gathering coke cups.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Shackleton, a onetime British merchant-navy officer who had got to within 100 miles of the south pole in 1908, started a business before his 1914 voyage to make money from movie and still photography.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The film classic the last picture show was the last movie shown in the old theater.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The movie is set in a small town where the only movie theater is preparing to close down.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The road novel, the road movie, these are the most typical American ideas, born of abundant petrol, cheap cars and a never-ending interstate highway system.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Theater owner ed bradford said he chose the movie because it seemed appropriate.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: They watch a movie while pedaling.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: Though the movie is 30 years old, most of the 250 seats were filled with teary-eyed audience wanting to say good-bye to the old building.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: You can watch a movie while you pedal by floating a microcomputer anywhere you want.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

sentences.cn: 电影的结局真没劲.
sentences.en: The conclusion of the movie was anticlimactic.

sentences.cn: 无声电影并非没有动作.
sentences.en: A silent movie doesn't mean it is motionless.

sentences.cn: 那种淫秽的电影决不能在电视上播放.
sentences.en: That filthy movie should never be shown on television.

sentences.cn: 他们花了一个月时间草率地拍成了那部电影.
sentences.en: They slapped the movie together in a month.

sentences.cn: 让我们去看电影,换换口味.
sentences.en: Let's see a movie for a change.

sentences.cn: 电影里的暴力行为使我反感.
sentences.en: The violence in the movie revolted me.

sentences.cn: 请注意,电影七点开映.
sentences.en: Please note that the movie starts at 7 o'clock.

sentences.cn: 这部电影掩饰了这次战争的真正问题.
sentences.en: The movie glosses over the real issues of the war.

sentences.cn: 故事片开始前放映了一部短纪录片.
sentences.en: A short documentary prefaced the feature movie.

sentences.cn: 这部影片真正抓住了纽约的特色.
sentences.en: This movie really catches the flavour of New York.

sentences.cn: 影片没有获得预期的成功.
sentences.en: The movie had less success than expected.

sentences.cn: 我们深深被那感伤的电影所感动.
sentences.en: We were deeply touched by the sentimental movie.

sentences.cn: 这部电影是配音的还是打字幕的?
sentences.en: Is the movie dubbed or does it have subtitles?

sentences.cn: 那部电影有助于她的银幕生涯的发展。
sentences.en: The movie helped boost her screen career.

sentences.cn: 肯定能弥合代沟的一部电影
sentences.en: a movie that is sure to bridge the generation gap

sentences.cn: 新闻界对她新近拍摄的电影大加诋毁。
sentences.en: The press did a very effective hatchet job on her last movie.

sentences.cn: 在戛纳举行的一年一度的影展
sentences.en: the movie industry's annual jamboree at Cannes

sentences.cn: 这部纪录片明日起在全国各地的影院上映。
sentences.en: The documentary opens tomorrow in movie theaters nationwide.

sentences.cn: 他因在该电影中扮演的角色而获评为最有前途的新演员。
sentences.en: He was voted the most promising new actor for his part in the movie.

sentences.cn: 这部电影再现了20世纪40年代好莱坞的辉煌。
sentences.en: The movie recreates the glamour of 1940s Hollywood.

sentences.cn: 罗伯特∙林赛在这部影片中担任配角。
sentences.en: The movie featured Robert Lindsay in a supporting role .

sentences.cn: 例如，学生们正在开发的其中一个应用程序可以根据你的情绪来为你推荐电影。
sentences.en: For instance, one of the apps the students are developing suggests movies based on your mood.

sentences.cn: 例如，忘记一部特别喜欢的电影中的某个演员的名字，根本不必担心。但是如果你忘记了这部电影的情节，或者甚至不记得看过这部电影，这种情况则让人担忧得多，达夫勒说道。
sentences.en: Forgetting the name of an actor in a favorite movie, for example, isnothing to worry about. But if you forget the plot of the movie or don't remember even seeing it, that's far more concerning, Daffner says.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: [50]他说：“读读书，去看看电影，培养一些新的爱好或者参加一些新的活动，从而迫使我们用新的方式思考。”换句话说，让你的大脑忙碌和运转起来。此外，还要做一些运动，因为，众所周知，运动有助于增强大脑的活力。
sentences.en: “Read books，go to movies，take on new hobbies or activities that force one to think in novel ways，” he says. In other words, keep your brain busy and working. And also get physically active, because exercise is a known brain booster.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 她不能把一部电影从头到尾好好看完.
sentences.en: She's not able to watch a movie from the beginning to the end.

sentences.cn: 你最近一次看电影到现在有多长时间了?
sentences.en: How long has it been since you last went to a movie?

sentences.cn: 她的梦想是成为一名电影明星.
sentences.en: Her dream is to become a movie star.

sentences.cn: 你永远无法想像的残酷, 一部挑战人性极限的恐怖电影.
sentences.en: You can never imagine the cruelty, a challenge to the limits of human horror movie.

sentences.cn: 不仅是老人, 很多年轻人也被这个电影打动.
sentences.en: Not only the old, but also the young are touched by the movie.

sentences.cn: 喜欢原作的影迷们会为今年夏天福克斯电影公司推出的影片疯狂一阵子.
sentences.en: Fans of the original are ready to go ape over this summer's movie offering from Fox.

sentences.cn: 片尾字幕: 罗列所有参与制作电影的人员的名单.
sentences.en: Credits: the long list of all the people involved in making the movie.

sentences.cn: 昨晚的那场电影是一部廉价伤感的片子, 不值得一看.
sentences.en: That movie last night was a corn ball. It was not worth seeing.

sentences.cn: 电影的结局真没劲.
sentences.en: The conclusion of the movie was anticlimactic.

sentences.cn: 每家电影院都上映不同的电影.
sentences.en: Each of the theaters has different movies.

sentences.cn: 你明天和我一起看电影好 么 ?
sentences.en: Would you like to join me for movie tomorrow?

sentences.cn: 在互联网, 我们可以也找到许多歌曲 、 电影和比赛.
sentences.en: On the Internet, we can also find lots of songs, movies and games.

sentences.cn: 电影就是一连串的图片,以非常快的速度投射而使人们的眼睛误以为它们是一个连续的整体.
sentences.en: A movie is a series of images projected so rapidly that the eye integrates them.

sentences.cn: 从另一个角度看, 它们像动画电影中跳舞蘑菇摇摆的圈环裙.
sentences.en: From another angle, they look like the swaying hoop skirts of dancing mushrooms in animated movie.

sentences.cn: 你有兴趣看电影 吗 ?
sentences.en: Will you is interested in seeing a movie?

sentences.cn: LESLIE:《白发魔女传》不是我们合作的第一部电影.
sentences.en: Leslie : The Bride with White Hair was not our first movie together.

sentences.cn: 电影明星放眼海外著重的是粉丝们和种种利益.
sentences.en: Movie stars look overseas to count fans and profits.

sentences.cn: 这就是我为什么会重新回来拍电影的原因.
sentences.en: That is why I have to be back for movie krub.

sentences.cn: 每家电影院都上映不同的电影.
sentences.en: Each of the theaters has different movies.

sentences.cn: 年轻人约会最常去的地方是电影院.
sentences.en: A very popular place for young people to go on date is the movies.

sentences.cn: 我是电影院里的常客, 通晓好莱坞电影最新动态.
sentences.en: As a frequent moviegoer, Iam keeping abreast of the latest development of Hollywood movies.

sentences.cn: 我那时正在电影院 [ 底特律 ]
sentences.en: I was at the movies. [ I was in Detroit. ]

sentences.cn: 你经常在家里看电影还是在电影院看电影?
sentences.en: Do you often watch movies at home or in the cinema?

sentences.cn: 大多数商城里有电影院, 或与电影院连在一起.
sentences.en: Most malls contain , or are connected to, several movie theatres.

sentences.cn: 卖食品和零食是电影院真正的主要收入.
sentences.en: Selling food and snacks is the real cash crop at the movies.

sentences.cn: 星期六晚上他们也许去一家餐馆或电影院.
sentences.en: And on Saturday night they might go to a public eating place or a movie.

sentences.cn: 我和汤姆说好在电影院见面的, 但他没来.
sentences.en: Tom and I were supposed to meet at the movie theatre , but he never showed up.

sentences.cn: 这部电影在秋天利物浦第一电影院开始首映式.
sentences.en: The movie will be premieredat the Odeon cinema, in Liverpool One, in the autumn.

sentences.cn: 丹尼和凯西在电影院, 丹想吃点东西.
sentences.en: Danny and Cathy are in a movie theater. Dan wants something to eat.

sentences.cn: 那里从前有一家电影院.
sentences.en: There was a movie house there.

sentences.cn: 电影院, 酒吧和迪斯科舞厅也已关闭.
sentences.en: Movie theaters, bars and discos have also been shut.

sentences.cn: 总之, 我们从电影院回来的时候, 爸爸已经带走了他的所有东西.
sentences.en: Anyway, we come back from the movies, and my dad had taken all his stuff.

sentences.cn: 很多电影院还有剧院.
sentences.en: Lots of movie houses, and the theater.

sentences.cn: 你喜欢在家里看电影?还是去电影院?
sentences.en: Do you prefer to see a movie home or in movie theater?

sentences.cn: 到电影院看电影时,无论如何都不要讲话.
sentences.en: Do not talk in a movie theater during the movie.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢看好看的怪兽电影和在黑暗的电影院里受惊吓的感觉.
sentences.en: I love going to see a good monster movie and being scared in the dark multiplex.

sentences.cn: 关于在电影院看电影她最留恋的是什么?
sentences.en: What does she miss most about watching movies at the cinema?

sentences.cn: 在电影院他触摸那个女孩.
sentences.en: He felt the girl in the movie theater.

sentences.cn: 我们的房子附近有一间新开幕的电影院.
sentences.en: There is a newly opened movie theatre right by our house.

sentences.cn: 你可以在电影院里面看电影.
sentences.en: You can see movies in a movie theater.

sentences.cn: 我们很想看一部好电影, 于是我们就到电影院去了.
sentences.en: We had an itch for good movie, so we went.

sentences.cn: 许多电影院和游乐公司会找快餐店合作推广双方的品牌.
sentences.en: Often, movie studios and entertainment companies will with fast food restaurants to promote both brands.

sentences.cn: 因为那天是愚人节, 电影院根本没有放电影.
sentences.en: Bcs that day is April Fool's Day, the cinema hadn't shown the movie.

sentences.cn: 我们的娱乐是每周去电影院看一次电影.
sentences.en: For amusement, we go to the movies once a week.

sentences.cn: 如果电影票大幅度降价,他会到电影院去看电影 吗 ?
sentences.en: Would he go and watch movies in the cinema if the ticket prices were greatly reduced?

sentences.cn: 今晚我们到电影院看电影好 吗 ?
sentences.en: Shall we go to the movies tonight?

sentences.cn: 我们有很好的电影院.
sentences.en: We have nice movie theaters.
sentences.from: 轻松英语会话---联想3000词(下)

sentences.cn: 蒂娜和比尔正从电影院走出来.
sentences.en: Tina and Bill are leaving a movie theater.

sentences.cn: 我一直想从事电影业。
sentences.en: I've always wanted to work in the movies.

sentences.cn: 今年他又因为对学院和电影业的贡献而获得一枚荣誉勋章.
sentences.en: This year, he won a medal of commendation for contributions to the academy and movie industry.

sentences.cn: 她在电影界工作[从事电影业].
sentences.en: She is in the movies.

sentences.cn: 电影业仅仅是好莱坞的产业之一.
sentences.en: Producing movies is only an industry of Hollywood.

sentences.cn: 甚至香港电影业也因拍摄《啪啦啪啦樱之花》而对啪啦啪啦舞青眼有加.
sentences.en: Even the Hong Kong movie industry has jumped on the bandwagon with Para Para Sakura.

sentences.cn: 这里遍地都是时尚商店 、 别致的小餐馆和富有情趣的酒吧——还有值得骄傲的电影业.
sentences.en: It's filled with fashionable shops, chic eateries and smart bars – then there's the movie.

sentences.cn: 电影业正想方设法增强观众对于电影的兴趣.
sentences.en: The industry is broadly trying to increase interest in the movies.

sentences.cn: 现在许多城市的电影业都有很大的发展.但好莱坞仍然是最引入注目的电影城.
sentences.en: Nowadays many cities are well developed in the most prominent movie city.

sentences.cn: 电影业也可以同样做出节制而不需要牺牲利润.
sentences.en: The movie industry could practice the same kind of restraint without sacrificing profitability.

sentences.cn: 我准备把电影业转变为一门艺术。
sentences.en: I was going to metamorphose the movies into an art.

sentences.cn: 电影业故意无视电视业的侵犯性竞争。
sentences.en: The movie industry had chosen to ignore the encroaching competition of television.

sentences.cn: 电影业从那时就开始完全走下坡路了。
sentences.en: For the movie business, it was all downhill from there.

Sentence.sentence: The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Equally, TV was supposed to replace movies but, again, did not.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Movies did, however, fatally impact some parts of live theater
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The way in which Mr Jobs revived the failing company he had co-founded and turned it into the world's biggest tech firm (bigger even than Bill Gates's Microsoft, the company that had outsmarted Apple so dramatically in the 1980s), sounds like something from a Hollywood movie.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The thefts are not the carefully planned burglaries(入室盗窃)that you see in movies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The movie starts in an hour. And we still have to get there and park. So just make a decision.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文
